Plugin shows up in AE but the crack doesn't work.  There is a .lic file in the folder but I still get the 'no license file found' message that asks me to register online.  I can't use the presets, the options box is not accessible because this isn't a proper crack.  It might work on some computers, because the license key is generated from the system profile, thus if the system is similar the key will work.  The key does not work on all systems.

@bumpydoughnut, you seem to be misunderstanding the Hardware Fingerprint.  There's nowhere you type it in, it's unique to your machine.  I need it so I can compare the .lic file with that hardware fingerprint and see if I can make a comparison and, using that, create a keygenerator.  Copyfukit, can you provide this?
CopyFuKit, you need to read your comments!  Can I have the Hardware Fingerprint that this crack was created on so I can try to reverse engineer them via comparison and write a keygen!
